title: Inflation rate of Ukraine 1994 to 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate change compared to previous year
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate change compared to previous year, containing a total of 31 data points.
In general Inflation rate change compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.

Inflation rate change compared to previous year is roughly constant from 1994 to 2002, roughly increasing from 2002 to 2003, roughly constant from 2003 to 2013, rapidly increasing from 2013 to 2015, and finally roughly constant from 2015 to 2024.
The highest Inflation rate change compared to previous year, of value 891.19 was reached at Year 1994
The lowest Inflation rate change compared to previous year, of value 0.26 was reported at Year 2013

The line drastically remained stable by 4.7 times from Year 1995 to 1996,remained stable by 5.0 times from Year 1996 to 1997,remained stable by 2.1 times from Year 1998 to 1999,remained stable by 15.7 times from Year 2001 to 2002,increased by 6.9 times from Year 2002 to 2003,remained stable by 1.7 times from Year 2003 to 2004,remained stable by 2.0 times from Year 2007 to 2008,remained stable by 14.0 times from Year 2011 to 2012,increased by 46.5 times from Year 2013 to 2014,increased by 4.0 times from Year 2014 to 2015, and lastly, remained stable by 3.5 times from Year 2015 to 2016.
